test-case.name: user can unenroll from paperless billing enrollment
test-case.title: user can unenroll from paperless billing enrollment

step.name: user navigates to Edit User Profile page and clicks on Unenroll button
step.title: user navigates to Edit User Profile page and clicks on Unenroll button

step.name: user accepts acknowledgement and submits form
step.title: user accepts acknowledgement and submits form

step.name: discontinue paperless billing successfull message is displayed "Discontinue Paperless Billing has been Successful."
step.title: discontinue paperless billing successfull message is displayed "Discontinue Paperless Billing has been Successful."

step.name: user closes success mesage dialog and go paperless card is displayed in Dashboard
step.title: user closes success mesage dialog and go paperless card is displayed in Dashboard

failure.message: unknown error: Cannot read property 'scrollTo' of null
failure.stack-trace: Error: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. at execute(<Function>) - index.js:316:3

test-case.name: Verify thank you message during paperless billing enrollment
test-case.title: Verify thank you message during paperless billing enrollment

step.name: user click on Go Paperless Card in Dashboard
step.title: user click on Go Paperless Card in Dashboard

step.name: Paperless billing enrollment form must be seen
step.title: Paperless billing enrollment form must be seen

step.name: Thank you message is seen "Thank you for requesting to participate in our paperless billing program which helps protect our environment by saving paper. Checking the box below confirms that you would like to receive your water bill and bill inserts online. You will no longer receive a paper bill. Instead, you will receive an email notification informing you that your water bill and other important information is ready for viewing through My Account. Should you want a copy for your records, you can simply print it from the web site."
step.title: Thank you message is seen "Thank you for requesting to participate in our paperless billing program which helps protect our environment by saving paper. Checking the box below confirms that you would like to receive your water bill and bill inserts online. You will no longer receive a paper bill. Instead, you will receive an email notification informing you that your water bill and other important information is ready for viewing through My Account. Should you want a copy for your records, you can simply print it from the web site."

step.name: user closes Paperless billing enrollment dialog
step.title: user closes Paperless billing enrollment dialog

failure.message: unknown error: Cannot read property 'scrollTo' of null

test-case.name: Verify acknowledgement during paperless billing enrollment
test-case.title: Verify acknowledgement during paperless billing enrollment

step.name: user click on Go Paperless Card in Dashboard
step.title: user click on Go Paperless Card in Dashboard

step.name: user acknowledgement message is seen "* Yes, I am confirming that I wish to receive my future water bills and communications online. I understand that once my registration has been activated, I will no longer receive a paper bill or standard paper communications."
step.title: user acknowledgement message is seen "* Yes, I am confirming that I wish to receive my future water bills and communications online. I understand that once my registration has been activated, I will no longer receive a paper bill or standard paper communications."

step.name: user checks the acknowledgement checkbox and submits
step.title: user checks the acknowledgement checkbox and submits

step.name: paperless enrollment successfull message is seen "Enrollment in Paperless Billing is Successful."
step.title: paperless enrollment successfull message is seen "Enrollment in Paperless Billing is Successful."

step.name: user closes Paperless billing enrollment dialog
step.title: user closes Paperless billing enrollment dialog

step.name: go paperless card must not be visible in Dashboard
step.title: go paperless card must not be visible in Dashboard

failure.stack-trace: Error: Request timed out after the element was still found on the page. at element(".amw-bill-payment-close-icon") - index.js:316:3
